arm_group.description: OCD patients being treated with any dose of escitalopram

brief_summary.textblock:
To modeling the pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic(PK-PD) simulation with the plasma
      concentration and the transporter occupancy from OCD patients treated with escitalopram.

      To examine the effect of G2677T/A single nucleotide polymorphism(SNP) of ABCB1 gene to the
      PK-PD modeling in OCD patients treated with escitalopram.

clinical_study.brief_title: Modeling Between Plasma Concentration and Serotonin Transporter Occupancy Induced by Escitalopram in Obsessive-compulsive Disorder(OCD) Patients

detailed_description.textblock:
To measure plasma concentration of escitalopram in OCD patients treated with escitalopram.

      To measure serotonin transporter occupancy by escitalopram in OCD patients treated with
      escitalopram.

      To genotype G2677T/A SNP of ABCB1 gene in OCD patients treated with escitalopram.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Diagnosis of OCD based on Diagnostic and Statistical Manual(DSM)-IV criteria

          -  no change of escitalopram dosage in 6 weeks

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  psychiatric comorbidity other than OCD

          -  History of head injury, epilepsy, other general medical disorder

clinical_study.official_title: Modeling Between Plasma Concentration and Serotonin Transporter Occupancy Induced by Escitalopram in Obsessive-compulsive Disorder(OCD) Patients

oversight_info.authority: Korea: Ministry for Health, Welfare and Family Affairs

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Modeling Between Plasma Concentration and Serotonin Transporter Occupancy Induced by Escitalopram in OCD Patients

secondary_outcome.description: scale for the severity of Obsessive-compulsive symptoms
serotonin transporter occupancy measured at 5 hour and 24 hour after oral dose of escitalopram
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the first 24hrs after oral administration of escitalopram

secondary_outcome.description: plasma concentration of escitalopram at baseline, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 10, 24, 48, 72 hour after oral dose of escitalopram
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 72 hours after oral administration of escitalopram
